comment.author: 26602074@N06
comment._content:
The tent canvas has been well secured by someone obviously used to handling buntlines and clewlines.

I edit my photo dates to reflect the actual image date, not the uploading date. This makes it searchable on the historic date. You may wish to consider doing likewise.

Cheers, John

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/blue_mountains_library_-_local_studies]  thanks for the suggestion John - we are looking at doing that from now on!
